title: We Are Canada
overview: We Are Canada is a bilingual six-part series telling the stories of a new generation of passionate change-makers whose work is shaping and defining our future in inspiring and imaginative ways.With stories selected from across the country and reflective of the cultural and ethnic diversity of our population, this series celebrates the accomplishments of young Canadians who are groundbreakers, innovators and visionaries within their respective fields of endeavour.We Are Canada is premised on the idea that we define ourselves by what we do and where we're going. The mission of the series is to make known to Canadians the Chris Hadfields, Naheed Nenshis, Robert Lepages, and James Orbinskis of the future.
